internships.title: Web Design Intern
internships.description: Looking for a web design intern to support our design team. Ideal candidates should have a strong understanding of color theory and typography.

internships.title: UI/UX Design Intern
internships.description: An opportunity for a UI/UX intern to work on client projects, assisting in wireframing, prototyping, and user research. Experience with Figma or Sketch is a plus.

internships.title: Front-End Developer Intern
internships.description: We are hiring a front-end intern to support our development team. Applicants should have basic knowledge of JavaScript and CSS frameworks.

internships.title: Graphic Design Intern
internships.description: Join us as a graphic design intern and work on branding, digital assets, and social media content. Must be proficient in Adobe Illustrator.

internships.title: Content Writing Intern
internships.description: We're looking for a content writing intern to assist in creating web and blog content. Ideal candidates are creative, self-motivated, and have strong writing skills.
